Thanks @CryptoMentor and @SecurityFirst! This is exactly what I needed.

Quick question - you both mentioned starting with MetaMask first. Is there a risk of getting hacked while learning? Should I use a separate computer or anything special?

Also, when you say "start small" - what's a reasonable amount to practice with? I don't want to lose money but also want to get real experience.

Finally, dumb question but - if I buy a hardware wallet, can I transfer coins FROM MetaMask TO the hardware wallet later? Or do I need to buy crypto fresh?
